patterns: hello
hii
wake up
namaste
hi
responses: Hello sir
Namaste Sir
Hii Sir
Welcome back Sir
How can I assist You Sir

patterns: bye
goodbye
see you later
sleep
exit
responses: Bye.
I am going to sleep
See you later
Meet you later
Bye - Bye

patterns: how are you
how are you feeling
how are you feeling today
are you fine
are you good
are you alright
how r u
responses: I am fine. Thank you
I am fine. How are you?
I am good. Thanks
I am good. How are you
Fine. Thanks

patterns: What's the temperature today
How is the temperature today
Tell me about today's Weather conditions
Is today a good day
What's the weather status today
Please tell me today's weather
responses: The sky is clear today
Today is a perfect day
Its a bit cloudy today
Its a bit cloudy
Its clear today

patterns: what is the time now
whats the time
please tell me the time
what is the time
responses: time

patterns: what is the date today
whats todays date
please tell me the date
what is the date
responses: date

patterns: what day is today
whats todays day
please tell me the day
what is the day
responses: day
